<style>
/* CSS 變數 - 與您網站其他區塊保持一致 */
:root {
    --primary-orange: #f08418;
    --secondary-orange: #ff9a3c;
    --text-white: #ffffff;
    --text-gray: #cccccc;
    --text-light-gray: #b0b0b0;
    --dark-bg: #000000;
    --card-bg-light: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05); /* 更輕量的卡片背景 */
    --card-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); /* 卡片邊框 */
}

/* 只針對加購區塊內的元素重置樣式 */
.add-on-section,
.add-on-section * {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

/* 移除影響全域的樣式 */
/* 
html {
    scroll-behavior: smooth;
}
body {
    font-family: 'Inter', 'Noto Sans TC', sans-serif;
    background: var(--dark-bg);
    color: var(--text-white);
}
*/

/* 只針對加購區塊的容器樣式 */
.add-on-section .container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 0 20px;
}

/* === 統一字體規範 - 遵循您的規範文件 === */
/* H1 - 頁面主標題（這裡用作區塊的最高級標題，但實際上頁面H1應唯一） */
.add-on-section .h1-add-on {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: var(--primary-orange);
    line-height: 1.2;
    margin: 0;
}
/* H2 - 區塊主標題 */
.add-on-section .h2-add-on {
    font-size: 2rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--text-white);
    line-height: 1.3;
    margin: 0;
}
/* H3 - 子區塊標題/產品名稱 */
.add-on-section .h3-add-on {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--text-white);
    line-height: 1.3;
    margin: 0;
}
/* 副文字說明 */
.add-on-section .text-secondary-add-on {
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    color: var(--text-gray);
    line-height: 1.5;
    font-weight: 400;
}
/* 按鈕文字 */
.add-on-section .button-text-add-on {
    font-size: 1rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--text-white);
}
/* 小文字 */
.add-on-section .text-small-add-on {
    font-size: 0.8rem;
    color: var(--text-light-gray);
    line-height: 1.4;
    font-weight: 400;
}

/* 加購區塊整體樣式 */
.add-on-section {
    background: var(--dark-bg);
    padding: 60px 0;
    position: relative;
    font-family: 'Inter', 'Noto Sans TC', sans-serif;
    color: var(--text-white);
}

/* 主要標題區 */
.add-on-section .add-on-header {
    text-align: center;
    margin-bottom: 40px;
    padding: 0 20px;
}
.add-on-section .add-on-title {
    /* 應用 h1-add-on 規範 */
    font-size: 2.5rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: var(--primary-orange);
    margin-bottom: 12px;
    background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--primary-orange), var(--secondary-orange));
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    background-clip: text;
    letter-spacing: 0.05em;
}
.add-on-section .add-on-subtitle {
    /* 應用 text-secondary-add-on 規範 */
    font-size: 1.2rem; /* 稍大於 text-secondary-add-on, 接近 h5 */
    color: var(--text-gray);
    max-width: 700px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    line-height: 1.6;
}
.add-on-section .add-on-emphasis {
    color: var(--primary-orange);
    font-weight: bold;
}

/* 加購產品容器 */
.add-on-section .add-on-products-wrapper {
    padding-top: 20px;
}
.add-on-section .add-on-category-section {
    margin-bottom: 40px;
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.add-on-section .add-on-category-header {
    text-align: left;
    margin-bottom: 30px;
    padding: 0 20px;
}
.add-on-section .add-on-category-title {
    /* 應用 h2-add-on 規範 */
    font-size: 2rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--text-white);
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.add-on-section .add-on-category-subtitle {
    /* 應用 text-secondary-add-on 規範 */
    font-size: 0.95rem;
    color: var(--text-light-gray);
}

/* 橫向滾動容器 */
.add-on-section .horizontal-scroll-container {
    display: flex;
    overflow-x: auto;
    overflow-y: hidden;
    gap: 25px;
    padding: 20px;
    padding-bottom: 40px;
    scroll-behavior: smooth;
    -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
    scrollbar-width: thin;
    scrollbar-color: var(--primary-orange) rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
}

/* 滾動條美化 */
.add-on-section .horizontal-scroll-container::-webkit-scrollbar {
    height: 8px;
}
.add-on-section .horizontal-scroll-container::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
    border-radius: 4px;
}
.add-on-section .horizontal-scroll-container::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    background: var(--primary-orange);
    border-radius: 4px;
    transition: background 0.3s ease;
}
.add-on-section .horizontal-scroll-container::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
    background: var(--secondary-orange);
}

/* 產品卡片 */
.add-on-section .product-card {
    flex-shrink: 0;
    width: 320px;
    background: var(--card-bg-light);
    backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
    border-radius: 16px;
    border: 1px solid var(--card-border);
    overflow: hidden;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
    position: relative;
}
.add-on-section .product-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-8px);
    border-color: var(--primary-orange);
    box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(240, 132, 24, 0.3);
    background: rgba(240, 132, 24, 0.08);
}
.add-on-section .product-image-container {
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
    padding: 20px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    height: 200px;
}
.add-on-section .product-image {
    max-height: 100%;
    max-width: 100%;
    object-fit: contain;
}
.add-on-section .product-content {
    padding: 20px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    flex-grow: 1;
}
.add-on-section .product-name {
    /* 應用 h3-add-on 規範 */
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--text-white);
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    height: 40px;
}
.add-on-section .product-desc {
    /* 應用 text-secondary-add-on 規範 */
    font-size: 0.85rem;
    color: var(--text-gray);
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    line-height: 1.5;
    height: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
}
.add-on-section .product-spec-select-wrapper {
    margin-bottom: auto; /* 將選擇器推到上方，讓價格和按鈕在底部 */
}
.add-on-section .product-spec-select {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 12px;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
    color: var(--text-white);
    border-radius: 8px;
    appearance: none;
    background-image: url('data:image/svg+xml;charset=UTF-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20viewBox%3D%220%200%2020%2020%22%3E%3Cpath%20fill%3D%22%23cccccc%22%20d%3D%22M4.516%207.548c0.436-0.446%201.043-0.446%201.479%200l3.961%204.044%203.961-4.044c0.436-0.446%201.043-0.446%201.479%200s0.436%201.171%200%201.615l-4.706%204.807c-0.436%200.446-1.043%200.446-1.479%200l-4.706-4.807c-0.436-0.446-0.436-1.171%200-1.615z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E');
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: right 12px center;
    background-size: 12px;
    outline: none;
    transition: border-color 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}
.add-on-section .product-spec-select:focus {
    border-color: var(--primary-orange);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(240, 132, 24, 0.4);
}
.add-on-section .product-spec-select option {
    background-color: var(--dark-bg);
    color: var(--text-white);
}

/* 價格區塊 - 調整為更低調的樣式 */
.add-on-section .price-display-standalone {
    text-align: left; /* 左對齊 */
    margin-top: 10px; /* 與上方選擇器間距 */
    margin-bottom: 15px; /* 與按鈕間距 */
    padding-top: 8px; /* 確保與上方內容有足夠空間 */
    border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05); /* 更細緻的分隔線 */
}
.add-on-section .price-display-standalone .price-value {
    font-size: 1.2rem; /* 大幅縮小字體 */
    font-weight: 500; /* 降低字重 */
    color: var(--text-light-gray); /* 顏色更柔和 */
    letter-spacing: normal; /* 移除自定義字距 */
}

/* 按鈕區塊 - 價格與按鈕現在分離 */
.add-on-section .add-to-cart-button-wrapper {
    margin-top: 0; /* 價格區塊已提供間距 */
}
.add-on-section .add-to-cart-btn {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    padding: 14px 25px;
    background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--primary-orange), var(--secondary-orange));
    color: var(--text-white);
    text-decoration: none;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 10px;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 1.05rem; /* 應用 button-text-add-on 規範 */
    font-weight: 600;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(240, 132, 24, 0.3);
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-align: center;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
}
.add-on-section .add-to-cart-btn:hover {
    transform: translateY(-3px);
    box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(240, 132, 24, 0.4);
}
.add-on-section .add-to-cart-btn.is-added {
    background: linear-gradient(45deg, #4CAF50, #66BB6A); /* 綠色成功提示 */
    box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(76, 175, 80, 0.3);
    cursor: default;
}
.add-on-section .add-to-cart-btn:disabled {
    background: #666;
    cursor: not-allowed;
    transform: none;
    box-shadow: none;
    opacity: 0.7;
}
.add-on-section .add-to-cart-btn .btn-text, 
.add-on-section .add-to-cart-btn .btn-loader {
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
}
.add-on-section .add-to-cart-btn .btn-loader {
    display: none;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
.add-on-section .add-to-cart-btn .btn-loader .spinner {
    display: inline-block;
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
    border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
    border-top-color: var(--text-white);
    border-radius: 50%;
    animation: add-on-spin 0.8s linear infinite;
}
@keyframes add-on-spin {
    to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

/* 頁尾連結 */
.add-on-section .add-on-footer {
    text-align: center;
    margin-top: 60px;
    padding-bottom: 30px;
}
.add-on-section .add-on-footer-text {
    /* 應用 text-secondary-add-on 規範 */
    color: var(--text-gray);
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.add-on-section .add-on-checkout-link {
    display: inline-block;
    color: var(--primary-orange);
    font-weight: 600;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 1.05rem; /* 應用 button-text-add-on 規範 */
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    border-bottom: 2px solid transparent;
}
.add-on-section .add-on-checkout-link:hover {
    color: var(--secondary-orange);
    transform: translateX(5px);
    border-color: var(--secondary-orange);
}
.add-on-section .add-on-checkout-link::after {
    content: '→';
    margin-left: 8px;
    transition: margin-left 0.3s ease;
}
.add-on-section .add-on-checkout-link:hover::after {
    margin-left: 12px;
}

/* 響應式設計 */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .add-on-section {
        padding: 40px 0;
    }
    .add-on-section .add-on-title {
        font-size: 2rem; /* 應用 h1-add-on 手機版規範 */
    }
    .add-on-section .add-on-subtitle {
        font-size: 1rem; /* 應用 text-secondary-add-on 手機版規範 */
    }
    .add-on-section .add-on-header {
        margin-bottom: 30px;
    }
    .add-on-section .add-on-category-title {
        font-size: 1.6rem; /* 應用 h2-add-on 手機版規範 */
    }
    .add-on-section .add-on-category-subtitle {
        font-size: 0.85rem; /* 應用 text-secondary-add-on 手機版規範 */
    }
    .add-on-section .add-on-category-section {
        margin-bottom: 30px;
    }
    .add-on-section .horizontal-scroll-container {
        gap: 15px;
        padding: 15px;
        padding-bottom: 30px;
    }
    .add-on-section .product-card {
        width: 280px;
        padding: 15px;
    }
    .add-on-section .product-image-container {
        height: 180px;
        padding: 15px;
    }
    .add-on-section .product-content {
        padding: 15px;
    }
    .add-on-section .product-name {
        font-size: 1.2rem; /* 應用 h3-add-on 手機版規範 */
        height: auto;
    }
    .add-on-section .product-desc {
        font-size: 0.8rem; /* 應用 text-small-add-on 手機版規範 */
        height: auto;
    }
    .add-on-section .product-spec-select {
        padding: 10px;
        font-size: 0.85rem;
    }
    .add-on-section .price-display-standalone {
        margin-top: 10px;
        margin-bottom: 15px;
    }
    .add-on-section .price-display-standalone .price-value {
        font-size: 1.2rem; /* 手機版價格 */
    }
    .add-on-section .add-to-cart-btn {
        padding: 12px 20px;
        font-size: 0.95rem; /* 應用 button-text-add-on 手機版規範 */
    }
    .add-on-section .add-on-footer {
        margin-top: 40px;
    }
    .add-on-section .add-on-footer-text, 
    .add-on-section .add-on-checkout-link {
        font-size: 0.85rem;
    }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
    .add-on-section .add-on-title {
        font-size: 1.8rem; /* 應用 h1-add-on 極小螢幕規範 */
    }
    .add-on-section .add-on-subtitle {
        font-size: 0.9rem; /* 應用 text-secondary-add-on 極小螢幕規範 */
    }
    .add-on-section .add-on-category-title {
        font-size: 1.4rem; /* 應用 h2-add-on 極小螢幕規範 */
    }
    .add-on-section .product-card {
        width: 250px;
    }
    .add-on-section .product-name {
        font-size: 1.1rem; /* 應用 h3-add-on 極小螢幕規範 */
    }
    .add-on-section .product-desc {
        font-size: 0.75rem; /* 應用 text-small-add-on 極小螢幕規範 */
    }
    .add-on-section .price-display-standalone .price-value {
        font-size: 1.1rem; /* 極小螢幕價格 */
    }
}

/* 螢幕閱讀器專用樣式 */
.add-on-section .sr-only {
    position: absolute;
    width: 1px;
    height: 1px;
    padding: 0;
    margin: -1px;
    overflow: hidden;
    clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
    white-space: nowrap;
    border: 0;
}
</style>

<script>
// 確保 APGOCartManager 已定義在您的全域 JS 檔案中
// 如果沒有，這裡提供一個簡易的替代品，但強烈建議您將 APGOCartManager 提取到全域 JS 檔案中
if (typeof window.cartManager === 'undefined') {
    console.warn("APGOCartManager is not defined. Providing a temporary fallback.");
    window.cartManager = {
        async addToCart(variantId, quantity, productName, properties) {
            console.log(`模擬加入購物車: ${productName}, ID: ${variantId}, 數量: ${quantity}, 屬性:`, properties);
            // 模擬成功或失敗
            return new Promise(resolve => {
                setTimeout(() => {
                    if (Math.random() > 0.1) { // 90% 成功
                        resolve({ success: true, data: { product_title: productName, variant_id: variantId, quantity: quantity, price: 100 } });
                    } else { // 10% 失敗
                        resolve({ success: false, error: '模擬加入失敗' });
                    }
                }, 800); // 模擬網路延遲
            });
        },
        showNotification(msg, type, autoShow) {
            if (autoShow) {
                // 這裡可以使用一個簡單的 alert 或更複雜的自定義通知UI
                console.log(`通知 (${type}): ${msg}`);
            }
        },
        updateCartUI() { console.log('模擬更新購物車UI'); }
    };
}

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    const productCards = document.querySelectorAll('.product-card');
    
    productCards.forEach(card => {
        const specSelect = card.querySelector('.product-spec-select');
        const priceValueElement = card.querySelector('.price-value');
        const addToCartBtn = card.querySelector('.add-to-cart-btn');
        const btnText = addToCartBtn.querySelector('.btn-text');
        const btnLoader = addToCartBtn.querySelector('.btn-loader');

        function updatePriceAndVariantId() {
            if (!specSelect) return;
            const selectedOption = specSelect.options[specSelect.selectedIndex];
            const price = selectedOption.dataset.price;
            const variantId = selectedOption.dataset.variantId;
            
            if (priceValueElement) {
                priceValueElement.textContent = `NT$ ${price}`;
            }
            addToCartBtn.dataset.variantId = variantId;
        }

        if (specSelect) {
            specSelect.addEventListener('change', updatePriceAndVariantId);
        }

        if (addToCartBtn) {
            addToCartBtn.addEventListener('click', async (e) => {
                e.preventDefault();
                
                const currentText = btnText.textContent;
                
                if (addToCartBtn.disabled) return;

                const variantId = addToCartBtn.dataset.variantId;
                const quantity = 1;
                const productName = specSelect.dataset.productName || card.querySelector('.product-name').textContent;
                const selectedSpec = specSelect.options[specSelect.selectedIndex].value;

                if (!variantId || variantId.includes('YOUR_VARIANT_ID_')) {
                    cartManager.showNotification('請先更新產品變體ID', 'error', true);
                    console.error('Variant ID is missing or placeholder for product:', productName);
                    return;
                }
                
                btnText.style.display = 'none';
                btnLoader.style.display = 'block';
                addToCartBtn.disabled = true;
                addToCartBtn.style.background = 'linear-gradient(45deg, #666, #999)';
                addToCartBtn.style.boxShadow = 'none';

                try {
                    const result = await cartManager.addToCart(variantId, quantity, productName, { '加購規格': selectedSpec });

                    if (result.success) {
                        btnText.textContent = '已加入！';
                        addToCartBtn.classList.add('is-added');
                        addToCartBtn.style.background = 'linear-gradient(45deg, #4CAF50, #66BB6A)';
                        addToCartBtn.style.boxShadow = '0 4px 15px rgba(76, 175, 80, 0.3)';
                    } else {
                        btnText.textContent = '加入失敗';
                        addToCartBtn.classList.remove('is-added');
                        addToCartBtn.style.background = 'linear-gradient(45deg, #f44336, #e57373)';
                        addToCartBtn.style.boxShadow = '0 4px 15px rgba(244, 67, 54, 0.3)';
                    }
                } catch (error) {
                    btnText.textContent = '錯誤！';
                    addToCartBtn.classList.remove('is-added');
                    addToCartBtn.style.background = 'linear-gradient(45deg, #f44336, #e57373)';
                    addToCartBtn.style.boxShadow = '0 4px 15px rgba(244, 67, 54, 0.3)';
                    console.error('Add to cart error:', error);
                } finally {
                    btnLoader.style.display = 'none';
                    btnText.style.display = 'block';
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        btnText.textContent = currentText;
                        addToCartBtn.disabled = false;
                        addToCartBtn.classList.remove('is-added');
                        addToCartBtn.style.background = 'linear-gradient(45deg, var(--primary-orange), var(--secondary-orange))';
                        addToCartBtn.style.boxShadow = '0 4px 15px rgba(240, 132, 24, 0.3)';
                    }, 2000);
                }
            });
        }

        updatePriceAndVariantId();
    });
});

function setupScrollControls() {
    const carousels = document.querySelectorAll('.horizontal-scroll-container');
    carousels.forEach(carousel => {
        carousel.addEventListener('wheel', function(e) {
            if (e.deltaY !== 0) {
                e.preventDefault();
                carousel.scrollLeft += e.deltaY;
            }
        }, { passive: false });

        let isDown = false;
        let startX;
        let scrollLeft;

        carousel.addEventListener('mousedown', (e) => {
            isDown = true;
            carousel.style.cursor = 'grabbing';
            startX = e.pageX - carousel.offsetLeft;
            scrollLeft = carousel.scrollLeft;
        });

        carousel.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
            isDown = false;
            carousel.style.cursor = 'grab';
        });

        carousel.addEventListener('mouseup', () => {
            isDown = false;
            carousel.style.cursor = 'grab';
        });

        carousel.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
            if (!isDown) return;
            e.preventDefault();
            const x = e.pageX - carousel.offsetLeft;
            const walk = (x - startX) * 2;
            carousel.scrollLeft = scrollLeft - walk;
        });
    });
}
